text: Hello Everyone, while creating a workflow we used custom code with the secrets , long back now want to view those secret values but I could not view those values?

1. how to hide the Chat button when not required or we are done with it?
2. Or can we make it draggable?
Please help some once

More than happy if someone points to the right Documentation thanks
You can delete it or hide it if that is what you mean. In Conversations -> chatflows,
This options you have from moving it. it is in your inbox settings under channels -> chat -> configure

Hi,
I'm looking for an API that we can use to send notifications from a Laravel application to HubSpot. These notifications would then trigger HubSpot to send emails to the contacts selected in the sent notification
